title: Enhancing Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Game-Based Language Education Design for Children with Learning Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Capability to explain a game-based learning design framework in three or more stages, reflecting cognitive and motor needs of learners with disabilities
Ability to analyze the impact of game elements (goals, rules, feedback) on language proficiency improvement through case-based studies
Capability to propose game mechanics supporting concentration, hand-eye coordination, and cognitive enhancement, referencing the ATHYNOS case
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
